targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  COUNT(temperature)
FROM weather
WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND location = '$location'
GROUP BY time

SELECT
  firmware
FROM weather
WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL '5 minutes' AND location = '$location'
ORDER BY time DESC
LIMIT 1

SELECT
  date_bin_gapfill(INTERVAL '1 minute', time) AS time,
  location,
  CASE
    WHEN AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) BETWEEN 0 AND 12.0 THEN ROUND(((50.0 - 0.0)/(12.0 - 0.0)) * (AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) - 0.0) + 0.0)
    WHEN AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) BETWEEN 12.1 AND 35.4 THEN ROUND(((100.0 - 51.0)/(35.4 - 12.1)) * (AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) - 12.1) + 51.0)
    WHEN AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) BETWEEN 35.5 AND 55.4 THEN ROUND(((150.0 - 101.0)/(55.4 - 35.5)) * (AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) - 35.5) + 101.0)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS aqi

FROM weather
WHERE
  air_quality_pm2_5 != 0
  AND air_quality_pm10 != 0
  AND (
    '${location:csv}' = 'All' OR POSITION(location IN '${location:csv}') > 0
  )
  AND time >= $__timeFrom AND time <= $__timeTo
GROUP BY date_bin_gapfill(INTERVAL '1 minute', time), location
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time) AS time,
  location,
  AVG(CASE
    WHEN air_quality_pm10 BETWEEN 0 AND 20 THEN air_quality_pm10
    ELSE NULL
  END) AS pm10,
  AVG(CASE
    WHEN air_quality_pm2_5 BETWEEN 0 AND 20 THEN air_quality_pm2_5
    ELSE NULL
  END) AS pm2_5
FROM weather
WHERE
  (
    '${location:csv}' = 'All' OR POSITION(location IN '${location:csv}') > 0
  )
  AND "time" >= $__timeFrom
  AND "time" <= $__timeTo
  AND air_quality_pm2_5 != 0
  AND air_quality_pm10 != 0
GROUP BY date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time), location
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_bin_gapfill(INTERVAL '1 minute', time) AS time,
  location,
  interpolate(AVG(air_quality_pm2_5)) AS pm2_5,
  interpolate(AVG(air_quality_pm10)) AS pm10,
  
  CASE
    WHEN AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) BETWEEN 0 AND 12.0 THEN ROUND(((50.0 - 0.0)/(12.0 - 0.0)) * (AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) - 0.0) + 0.0)
    WHEN AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) BETWEEN 12.1 AND 35.4 THEN ROUND(((100.0 - 51.0)/(35.4 - 12.1)) * (AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) - 12.1) + 51.0)
    WHEN AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) BETWEEN 35.5 AND 55.4 THEN ROUND(((150.0 - 101.0)/(55.4 - 35.5)) * (AVG(air_quality_pm2_5) - 35.5) + 101.0)
    ELSE NULL
  END AS aqi

FROM weather
WHERE
  air_quality_pm2_5 != 0
  AND air_quality_pm10 != 0
  AND (
    '${location:csv}' = 'All' OR POSITION(location IN '${location:csv}') > 0
  )
  AND time >= $__timeFrom AND time <= $__timeTo
GROUP BY date_bin_gapfill(INTERVAL '1 minute', time), location
ORDER BY time

panels.description:
Trend:
- Rising (↑): Improving weather
- Falling (↓): Rain or storm possible
- Steady (→): Stable conditions

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (SELECT pressure FROM weather WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1) -
  (SELECT pressure FROM weather WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo - INTERVAL '3 hours' ORDER BY time DESC LIMIT 1)
  AS pressure_delta
FROM "weather" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "location" = 'living-room' ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time) AS time,
  location,
  AVG(CASE
    WHEN temperature BETWEEN -10 AND 50 THEN temperature
    ELSE NULL
  END) AS temperature
FROM weather
WHERE
  (
    '${location:csv}' = 'All' OR POSITION(location IN '${location:csv}') > 0
  )
  AND "time" >= $__timeFrom
  AND "time" <= $__timeTo
GROUP BY date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time), location
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time) AS time,
  location,
  AVG(CASE
    WHEN humidity BETWEEN 20 AND 90 THEN humidity
    ELSE NULL
  END) AS humidity
FROM weather
WHERE
  (
    '${location:csv}' = 'All' OR POSITION(location IN '${location:csv}') > 0
  )
  AND "time" >= $__timeFrom
  AND "time" <= $__timeTo
GROUP BY date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time), location
ORDER BY time

SELECT
  date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time) AS time,
  location,
  AVG(CASE
    WHEN pressure BETWEEN 100000 AND 104000 THEN pressure
    ELSE NULL
  END) AS pressure
FROM weather
WHERE
  (
    '${location:csv}' = 'All' OR POSITION(location IN '${location:csv}') > 0
  )
  AND "time" >= $__timeFrom
  AND "time" <= $__timeTo
GROUP BY date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time), location
ORDER BY time

WITH binned_data AS (
  SELECT
    date_bin_gapfill($__interval, time) AS binned_time,
    AVG(pressure) AS avg_pressure_for_bin
  FROM weather
  WHERE
    "time" >= $__timeFrom
    AND "time" <= $__timeTo
  GROUP BY binned_time
)
SELECT
  binned_time AS time,
  AVG(avg_pressure_for_bin) OVER (
    ORDER BY binned_time
    ROWS BETWEEN 25 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
  ) AS pressure_trend
FROM binned_data
ORDER BY binned_time;

panels.description:
Indicate comfort, mold risk, or fog potential:

< 0    : Very dry (cold, desert-like air)      
0 – 10 : Dry air (comfortable in cool climates)
10 – 16: Comfortable indoor air                
16 – 18: A bit humid                           
18 – 21: Sticky or humid                       
> 21   : Very humid (tropical, uncomfortable)  
> 24   : Oppressive (high mold risk indoors)

targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (temperature - ((100 - humidity) / 5.0)) AS dew_point
FROM weather
WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND location = '$location'
ORDER BY time

panels.title: Dew Point

targets.rawSql: SELECT "temperature" FROM "weather" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "location" = '$location' ORDER BY time

SELECT humidity
FROM weather
WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL '1 day' AND "location" = '$location'
SELECT "pressure" FROM "weather" WHERE "time" >= $__timeFrom AND "time" <= $__timeTo AND "location" = '$location' ORDER BY time

SELECT
  MAX(temperature) AS max,
  MIN(temperature) AS min,
 AVG(temperature) - ((0.55 - (0.0055 * AVG(humidity))) * (AVG(temperature) - 14.5)) AS "feels like"
FROM weather
WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL '1 day' AND "location" = '$location'

SELECT
  MAX(humidity) AS max,
  MIN(humidity) AS min,
  (
    (6.112 * POWER(2.71828, (17.67 * AVG(temperature)) / (AVG(temperature) + 243.5)) * AVG(humidity) * 2.1674)
    / (273.15 + AVG(temperature))
  ) AS "absolute humidity"
FROM weather
WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL '1 day' AND "location" = '$location'

SELECT
  MAX(pressure) AS max,
  MIN(pressure) AS min
FROM weather
WHERE time >= now() - INTERVAL '1 day' AND "location" = '$location'
